text: evadaite - ihalokanlo mariyu paralokanlo kuda - allah, ataniki (pravaktaku) sahayapadadani bhavistado! (Vadiki sadhyamaite) vadini oka tradu sahayanto akasampaiki poyi, taruvata vatini (ante pravaktapai avatarimpa jeyabade vahi mariyu itara sahayalanu) trempi cudamanu, atadi i yukti atadi krodhavesanni duram ceyagalademo
